net.nologin.meep.tbv

Enum GridAnchor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<GridAnchor>
      • net.nologin.meep.tbv.GridAnchor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GridAnchor>

    public enum GridAnchor
extends java.lang.Enum<GridAnchor>
    When repositioning the grid to display a certain tile, this enum can be used to instruct the creation of the grid in such a way that the desired tile is located at the desired position on the view surface.

      • getPosition

        public final android.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> getPosition(int surfaceWidth,
                                                                 int surfaceHeight,
                                                                 int tileWidth)
        Calculate the x,y (or left,top in canvas speak) coordinates at which a tile would need to be drawn to match this constant.
        Parameters:
        surfaceWidth - The screen width in px
        surfaceHeight - The screen height in px
        tileWidth - The width of a tile in px
        Returns:
        A Pair containing the (left,top) position as described.
